seo.title: Using Brand Lift Studies to Measure DOOH Impact
seo.description: Brand lift studies are an essential attribution tool for understanding the effectiveness of digital out-of-home (DOOH) campaigns. In this webinar, weâ€™ll explain why brand lift studies are a powerful way to measure campaign impact, compare them to other attribution solutions, and provide actionable recommendations on how to run them effectively in your omnichannel strategy.
